Name: Pnevmo-Capsula: Domiki
About the game: 'Pnevmo-Capsula' is an indie casual adventure game. You will travel to an alternate utopian atompunk world as a small trolley delivering mail. The mail here is delivered by carts on small rails, and you will play the role of one of these carts. The pneumo-capsule must be delivered to the right place. On the way you will find obstacles, barriers, various puzzles, dead ends and labyrinths.
